entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 March 2023
